comments.body: Please make a PR upstream to include this in the MANIFEST.in file of the upstream sdist.

PR is here: https://github.com/lins05/slackbot/pull/200

But the project is not very active. Could we merge this and I'll update the feedstock once the PR is merged?
Yup! We should simply attempt to submit a PR. That is all.
